original_title: The Triumphant Return of RigidPenis the PurpleHelmetAvenger
overview: RigidPenis 2.0 The Dark Spike  I have yet to see a cowardly UTTP officer's face. I don't suspect I ever will. They lack the testicular fortitude. As long as the UTubeTrollPolice post an interesting comment it will not be deleted. If it is interesting, I will leave it. I will force you fuckers to talk and quit hiding behind phrases. Any silly shot of phrases, they will be deleted!
tagline: Death to the terrorist troll organization known as the UTubeTrollPolice.
title: The Triumphant Return of RigidPenis the PurpleHelmetAvenger
